allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "feat: Report shell unification and production readiness" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Unify report shell components across all analyzers for consistent UI/UX
- Complete production readiness hardening with security improvements
- Implement Stripe billing with subscriptions and single report purchases
- Add premium PDF generators for all analyzer types
- Make dashboard the homepage with improved navigation

## Key Changes

### Security & Production Readiness
- Enable Helmet security middleware \(CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options\)
- Add production validation for JWT_SECRET, STRIPE_SECRET_KEY, CORS_ORIGIN
- Set production-appropriate rate limits
- Disable payment demo mode by default
- Fix password reset to not return token in production

### Billing & Monetization
- Implement Stripe checkout for Pro subscriptions \(monthly/yearly\)
- Add single report purchase flow
- Create billing success/cancel pages
- Add entitlements system for paid features

### Report Components
- Unify report accordion and shell components
- Add ProReportBlock for consistent paywall UI
- Implement PricingModal component
- Add screenshot lightbox functionality

### PDF Generators
- Add premium PDF generators for all analyzers
- Improve PDF styling with Material Design
- Add charts and visualizations to PDF reports

## Test plan
- [ ] Verify security headers are present in responses
- [ ] Test rate limiting with production values
- [ ] Verify Stripe checkout flow works
- [ ] Test PDF generation for all analyzer types
- [ ] Verify dashboard loads correctly as homepage

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")
